text: Expo Silesia is an exhibition and trade fair center located in the city of Sosnowiec, Poland in the Silesian Voivodeship, near Dąbrowa Górnicza. The center is located in place of the Silma factory, and was funded by Kolporter Expo Ltd (a member of the Kolporter Group). ==External links== *Kolporter Expo official site *Localization of Expo Silesia in Wikimapia Category:Trade fairs in Poland Category:Buildings and structures in Sosnowiec
title: Expo Silesia
